title: Coronado National Memorial: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Coronado National Memorial is open year-round from dawn to dusk. The park closes daily at dusk and visitors are expected to be back from hikes and activities at this time. Coronado National Memorial Visitor Center The visitor center is located about 2 miles west of the east entrance. This accessible center features exhibits, a park film, gift shop, educational bookstore, and picture window for wildlife and bird watching opportunities. Rangers provide information and offer selected winter and spring programs.  Phone: (520) 366-5515 Operating Hours: 8:00 am to 4:00 pm daily (closed Christmas Day)
